description: This file defines the 'Notification' class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which inherits from WPEFramework::Core::JSONRPC::Message. It declares a constructor, destructor, and member functions 'toString' and 'isValid'. The class is designed for representing JSON RPC notifications in a WebSockets context. It includes include guards and references an external module 'Module.h'.

classes.name: Notification
classes.description: Represents a JSON RPC Notification message, inheriting from WPEFramework::Core::JSONRPC::Message. Provides methods to convert the message to a string and to validate its contents.

methods.name: Notification
methods.description: Default constructor for the Notification class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the Notification object.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks if the Notification message is valid.
